body_html: @Daniel451 What I did was open target/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl and find eigen_archive and then change the values in the stanza located there. You will have to download the tar.gz file and get the sha256 sum so you can fill that in properly.

body: @Daniel451  What I did was open target/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl and find eigen_archive and then change the values in the stanza located there. You will have to download the tar.gz file and get the sha256 sum so you can fill that in properly.
